name: Cubes In Danger 2 (GamesByrd)
description:
There is a board that never stops. Don't stop too! Stay alive longer than your competitor!

You are a cube, and you are in danger. Grab as much as you can, and avoid as much as you can! Well, there is a bit of it.

Discover great levels with suprising traps and fabulous challenges!

2 Players required! 

Controls: Arrows, WASD, Spacebar.
